layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x576
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x52

              text run at (0,0) width 156: "DT text is rendered here"
          LayoutBlockFlow {DD} at (0,34) size 784x18
